  • Methodendetails

    • handleDisplayContent

      public void handleDisplayContent()
      Handles the display of content selected from the ListView. It creates a ScreenOutput instance if not already created, displays the selected content, and logs the action in the text area.

    • updateListView

      public void updateListView(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Content> contentList)
      Updates the list view with the provided content list. s
      Parameter:
      contentList - The content list to be displayed in the list view.

    • setTextInTextArea

      public void setTextInTextArea(String text)
      Sets the text in the log text area.
      Parameter:
      text - The text to be set in the log text area.

    • setObservable

      public void setObservable(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Content> items)
      Sets the observable list for the controller.
      Parameter:
      items - The observable list to be set.

    • getContentFromClient

      private String getContentFromClient()
      Retrieves content from the client. This is a placeholder method and needs to be implemented according to the application logic.
      Gibt zurück:
      String representing the content from the client.

    • ExportLogButtonPressed

      public void ExportLogButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Exports the log to a text file when the export log button is pressed.
      Parameter:
      actionEvent - The action event triggered by the button press.
